name: Runes of the Old Order
description:
Runes of the Old Order

Part fantasy puzzle quest, part visual novel, engage the eaters and other threats on a journey to the Old Order ruins. Win turn based puzzle battles against friends and foes alike and press on, adventurer!

Features
  • Match 3 style puzzle battles
  • Story driven cutscenes
  • Anime fantasy avatars
  • 8 missions
  • 5 fantasy style locations
